A young man travels from Tehran to Paris to study abroad. At the university, he meets and falls in love with a young Jewish woman. But when World War II breaks out, he's forced to return home, and he helps smuggle the woman and her mother back to Iran with him to get away from the Nazis who've occupied France. With Iran itself occupied by imperial powers, the young man helps launch a newspaper focused on preserving and promoting the country's heritage and culture, as political intrigues threaten to destroy everything he holds dear.
